title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 211.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 211.1 - Scope

State Regulations
(a) This Part
applies to the agency's authority pursuant to section
205.5
(k) of the
act to issue subpoenas to compel the attendance of a person to testify at a
hearing conducted by the board or a designee of the board on behalf of a party
or subpoenas requiring the production of books, papers, documents or other
objects on behalf of a party. (b) Nothing contained herein shall in any way affect the right of any person or
entity to issue a subpoena pursuant to law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
211.1

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
